column5: Youâ€™ll love our newly built home in a gated community, tucked away and walking distance from Lake Lewisville. It is conveniently located just miles away from Toyota Stadium, The Star, The Shops at Legacy (shopping & dining), and just a 30min drive from both DFW & Love Field Airports.  In addition to being gated; our home has a full security system.  The community pool is also available during the summer season.  Great for couples, solo adventurers, business travelers, and families (with kids).
column8: Brand New Home In Gated Community Near The Lake
